section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: In text, processors SHOULD render the contents of subscript as a typographical subscript. In audio and other rendering formats, processors MAY distinguish the contents of subscript in some other way.

section.title: XDITA example

Food Additives for pH Control

In very rare occasions, our Sensei Sushi kitchen lab technicians can use Sulfuric Acid, FCC (H2SO4) to control pH during processing. Ask your supervisor for more information.
